column5: The photo gallery doesnt seem to be working the last couple days for me.   Has anyone else had any luck uploading photos to it??  Darren
I had trouble a couple weeks ago. Wouldn't load at first, when i did get on it wouldn't show any thumbnails.  I went to Photobucket, much easier all around.
The gallery got hacked a while back and we're still working to get it running properly. As far as I know, it's working now but the thumbnails aren't showing.
Nope, still not working Roy, I've been able to access my photos but can't upload any.
I didn't see your name in the photo gallery. Where is that pic from?
I just used the attach this file option at bottom of msg  Not sure---I know just enough about computers to be dangerous
